```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
import yaml

# Load personal data
with open('_data/personal.yml', 'r') as f:
    personal = yaml.safe_load(f)

# Extract info
info = personal.get('info', {})
contact = personal.get('contact', {})
social = personal.get('social', {})

# Print name and title
print(f"# {info.get('name', 'Name')}")
print(f"### {info.get('position', 'Position')}")
print(f"#### {info.get('title', '')}")
print()

# Print summary
print("## About Me")
print(info.get('summary', ''))
print()

# Contact information
print("## Contact")
print()
print(f"üìß Email: [{contact.get('email')}](mailto:{contact.get('email')})")
print(f"üì± Phone: {contact.get('phone')}")
print(f"üìç Location: {contact.get('address')}")
print()

# Social links
print("## Connect")
print()
if social.get('github'):
    print(f"- [GitHub]({social.get('github')})")
if social.get('linkedin'):
    print(f"- [LinkedIn]({social.get('linkedin')})")
if social.get('orcid'):
    print(f"- [ORCID]({social.get('orcid')})")
if social.get('googlescholar'):
    print(f"- [Google Scholar]({social.get('googlescholar')})")
if social.get('twitter'):
    print(f"- [Twitter/X]({social.get('twitter')})")
```

## Recent Highlights

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
# Load projects data
with open('_data/projects.yml', 'r') as f:
    projects_data = yaml.safe_load(f)

# Show first 3 projects as highlights
projects = projects_data.get('projects', [])[:3]
for project in projects:
    title = project.get('title', 'N/A')
    url = project.get('url', '')
    description = project.get('description', '').split('\n')[0]  # First paragraph
    
    if url:
        print(f"### [{title}]({url})")
    else:
        print(f"### {title}")
    print(f"{description}")
    print()
```
